author: costin
msg: Read and store taglibs as a context property.

author: costin
msg: - Read and set security-role-ref, as a property of ServletWrapper.
SecurityRole maps servlet view of the roles to server roles.
- added back web.xml and web.dtd to etc/ ( both are config files ),

author: costin
msg: - Added a new ServletLoader interface, with API support for reloading.
- Added a SerivletLoader implementation that plugs in AdaptiveClassLoader
Please note that this is just code to clarify core interfaces, not
an implementation for class reloading ( which require a lot more).
( right now class reloading should work - i.e. if you change a class
it will reload it, but the internal state will be a mess. I have no ideea
how it will interact with JSP reloading either.)
